attributes.title: Garfield Goes Dark - #171
attributes.caption: Garfield is not taking crap anymore, Max and Christina teach America about purity, and Jon has a new haircut.
attributes.description: Garfield is not taking crap anymore, Max and Christina teach America about purity, and Jon has a new haircut. Sponsored by Audible (Audible.com/ONTHESPOT), Squarespace (Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT), and Raycon (BuyRaycon.com/SPOT). Featuring Chris Demarais, Blaine Gibson, Max Kruemcke, Christina Parish, and hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: The Bachelorette With Sharks - #172
attributes.caption: Burnie is the hottest shark ever, Barbara becomes a conflicted bachelorette, Andrew is dirty and thirsty, and Todd has a terrible new restaurant concept.
attributes.description: Burnie is the hottest shark ever, Barbara becomes a conflicted bachelorette, Andrew is dirty and thirsty, and Todd has a terrible new restaurant concept. Sponsored by Squarespace (Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT), Dollar Shave Club (DollarShaveClub.com/SPOT), and This Might Get Weird Tour (Ticket Info @GRACEHELBIG). Featuring Burnie Burns, Barbara Dunkelman, Todd Womack, Andrew Rosas, and hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: RTX 2019 Live! On The Spot - #173
attributes.caption: The kings of voice over battle Jeremy and Ryan of Achievement Hunter in a mind-bending, genre-jumping live comedy extravaganza.
attributes.description: The kings of voice over battle Jeremy and Ryan of Achievement Hunter in a mind-bending, genre-jumping live comedy extravaganza. Sponsored by HelloFresh (HelloFresh.com/SPOT80). Featuring Troy Baker, Nolan North, Jeremy Dooley, Ryan Haywood, and hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: The Last On the Spot Ever? - #174
attributes.caption: Special guest host Zach Anner takes over for what is surely the last episode of On the Spot ever. Josh gives Chris medical advice, and Jon finally pops the question to Gus.
attributes.description: Special guest host Zach Anner takes over for what is surely the last episode of On the Spot ever. Josh gives Chris medical advice, and Jon finally pops the question to Gus. Sponsored by Squarespace (http://Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT), Honey (http://JoinHoney.com/ROOSTER), and Vicious Summer. Featuring Chris Demarais, Josh Flanagan, Gus Sorola, Jon Risinger, and hosted by Zach Anner.
attributes.display_title: The Last On the Spot Ever? - #174

attributes.title: Avatar 2 Sneak Peek - #175
attributes.caption: Barbara and Andrew reveal some behind the scenes secrets from Avatar 2 as they take on fearsome space general Borf and his warrior queen Mariel.
attributes.description: Barbara and Andrew reveal some behind the scenes secrets from Avatar 2 as they take on fearsome space general Borf and his warrior queen Mariel. Sponsored by Raycon (http://buyraycon.com/spot). Featuring Barbara Dunkelman, Andrew Rosas, Mariel Salcedo, and Blaine Gibson. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: The Guy Fieri Diet - #176
attributes.caption: Guy Fieri and Emeril Lagasse show you how to kick it up a notch in Flavortown. Mary Berry and Nigella Lawson promote their new book and all-wine cake recipe.
attributes.description: Guy Fieri and Emeril Lagasse show you how to kick it up a notch in Flavortown. Mary Berry and Nigella Lawson promote their new book and all-wine cake recipe. Sponsored by Squarespace (http://Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT) and find out our second sponsor at http://whatthefuckisthisshit.com/SPOT. Featuring Chad James, Cole Gallian, Jessica Vasami, and Ellie Main. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: How Wide's Your Jaw? - #177
attributes.caption: Miles and Kerry establish the first ever Jeremy Renner Fan Club, and Max and Christina show everyone just how super they really aren't.
attributes.description: Miles and Kerry establish the first ever Jeremy Renner Fan Club, and Max and Christina show everyone just how super they really aren't. Sponsored by NHTSA. Featuring Miles Luna, Kerry Shawcross, Max Kruemcke, and Christina Parrish. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: I've Seen A Ball - #178
attributes.caption: Gus and Chad are really excited about World of Warcraft Classic, Matt and Jeremy demonstrate what it's like to take steroids, and everyone shows just how little they know about sports.
attributes.description: Gus and Chad are really excited about World of Warcraft Classic, Matt and Jeremy demonstrate what it's like to take steroids, and everyone shows just how little they know about sports. Sponsored by Squarespace (http://Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT). Featuring Jeremy Dooley, Gus Sorola, Matt Bragg, and Chad James. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: Homemade Milk - #179
attributes.caption: Mariel and Ellie put a ban on all parties, and Cole brings a very special guest to be his teammate.
attributes.description: Mariel and Ellie put a ban on all parties, and Cole brings a very special guest to be his teammate. Sponsored by Raycon (http://BuyRaycon.com/SPOT). Featuring Mariel Salcedo, Ellie Main, Cole Gallian, and Max Kruemcke. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: X-Men Joins Rooster Teeth? - #180
attributes.caption: Professor X and Cyclops pay a visit to On the Spot, Michael is extremely passionate about Spongebob, and Lindsay shows off her drawing skills.
attributes.description: Professor X and Cyclops pay a visit to On the Spot, Michael is extremely passionate about Spongebob, and Lindsay shows off her drawing skills. Sponsored by Squarespace (http://Squarespace.com/ONTHESPOT), Liquid Death (http://LiquidDeath.com/SPOT) and RTX (http://RTXEvent.com). Featuring Michael Jones, Lindsay Jones, Chad James, and Todd Womack. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: Unhappy Accidents, Lubrication, & Sesame Street - #181
attributes.caption: Gus and Barbara love The Simpsons, Chad and Christina found a new nation, and we all remember how much we love Bob Ross.
attributes.description: Gus and Barbara love The Simpsons, Chad and Christina found a new nation, and we all remember how much we love Bob Ross. Sponsored by HelloFresh (http://HelloFresh.com/SPOT80) and Audible (http://Audible.com/ONTHESPOT). Featuring Gus Sorola, Barbara Dunkelman, Chad James, and Christina Parrish. Hosted by Jon Risinger.

attributes.title: The Church of On the Spot - #182
attributes.caption: Clayton makes his glorious return to the world of On the Spot, along with his intern Chris, while Jessica and Andrew teach us about no-no zones.
attributes.description: Clayton makes his glorious return to the world of On the Spot, along with his intern Chris, while Jessica and Andrew teach us about no-no zones. Sponsored by Dave (http://Dave.com). Featuring Blaine Gibson, Chris Demarais, Andrew Rosas, and Jessica Vasami. Hosted by Jon Risinger. Live production powered by Blackmagic Design.
